name: Idle Pixel Cinema
description:
This is an early prototype, expect more features, changes and bug fixes soon.

Gameplay:
1) Collect pixels
2) Use them to fill movie posters
3) Unlock more movie posters and repeats (1)

Planned features:
1) Gallery to show the posters you've collected
2) Collections that group movies together with genres, directors etc and give bonuses based on collecting them
3) Prestiges
4) UI improvements

Feel free to leave any feedback you have in the comment section below!
